Title: SAMPLE 06
Credit: Written by
Author: Jane Doe
Source: Story by JD
Draft date: 1/1/2018
Contact:

ACME Example Productions
1234 5th Avenue
Anytown, SOMESTATE 012345-1234


INT. STUDIO APARTMENT - NIGHT

The AUTHOR sits at a desk.

AUTHOR
(anguished)
Writers block again!

DISSOLVES TO:

EXT. PARK - DAY

Author is jogging. DOG runs up to her and speaks in a human voice.

DOG
Bark! Bark! Roof! Your not blocked. You're trying to write the story from the wrong chacacter's viewpoint.

AUTHOR
(disbelief)
But you spoke?

DOG
That goes without saying, better run along before you loose your cardio moment.

===

INT. STUDIO APARTMENT - NEXT DAY

The author is sprawled on the couch.

AUTHOR
(refreshed)
Shall we try?

FADE TO BLACK.

THE END.
